title: (PSX-PSP) Marvel Super Heroes vs. Street Fighter converted prope
description:
MARVEL SUPER HEROES vs. STREET FIGHTER:

This is the game that will finally settle those arguments about who is tougher, Ryu or Wolverine. There are five modes of play: Battle, Versus, Training, Hero Battle, and Crossover. Battle and Versus are your typical one and two-player fighting game modes, while Hero Battle is an endurance mode that separates the groups to see which has the stronger stable of fighters. There are 17 combatants available, nine from STREET FIGHTER and eight from the Marvel camp. This game is a port of the arcade hit of the same name and features the type of gameplay that has made Capcom one of the most respected developers of fighting games on the planet. Expect plenty of dragon punches, fireballs, and huge chain combinations as you pit your favorite characters from these two franchises against each other.

Tested and working on all CFW's 5.00 m33 and above using the 500 popsloader pack set on 3.72 POPS...KloWn
